body:
Post a description of a movie you invent by removing 1 letter from an existing movie.

I'll start.

The Amazing Spider-Ma

A woman passes out drunk at a party, and later gives birth to thousands of radioactive spiders.
body_tagged:
Post a description of a movie you invent by removing 1 letter from an existing movie.

I'll start.

The Amazing Spider-Ma

A woman passes out drunk at a party, and later gives birth to thousands of radioactive spiders.
title: Movie Minus 1 Letter Thread

replies.body:
Aw (Original movie is saw).
A group of killers decide to go to people's houses and show them affection instead of killing them.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Flock of Dude: A group of teenage boys that are stranded on an island and live off of vanilla pudding for 3 weeks.

Aken (Taken)
A man goes through the whole movie with a sore leg.
(get it, it is aching!)

replies.body:
Itch Perfect (Pitch Perfect)

A lady had major rashes. No matter how she scratched.and how much she scratched, it was always itchy. Barack Obama comes along and his sleeve accidentally rubs on her rash. That was when it was itch perfect.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Froze. The story of frozen but Anna didn't manage to save the day and everything stayed frozen. Suck it Frozen fans.
